models.pageContent: The headline and introductory text displayed at the top of the contact page.
models.contactTypes: The three engagement options showing different ways visitors can connect with ГО "Розум".
models.contactInfo: The direct contact information including email address.

relationships: Page content introduces the contact options
Contact types describe different engagement pathways (experts, partners, investors)
The contact form and email link both allow visitors to submit a Contact Inquiry

pageContent.headline: Get in Touch
pageContent.intro: Whether you're an expert looking to contribute, a partner seeking collaboration, or an investor interested in Ukraine's future — we'd love to hear from you.

contactTypes.title: Join as an Expert
contactTypes.description: Contribute your expertise in AI, urban planning, energy, healthcare, or other domains to help shape Ukraine's AI-powered cities.

contactTypes.title: Partner With Us
contactTypes.description: Explore collaboration opportunities for technology transfer, research initiatives, or strategic partnerships in urban innovation.

contactTypes.title: Invest in the Future
contactTypes.description: Learn about funding pathways and investment opportunities in building transformative AI-powered cities across Ukraine.
